alert.note: Alert for Lycoming; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 19 at 10:38AM EST until February 19 at 11:30AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Northwestern Lycoming County in north central Pennsylvania... Eastern Tioga County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 1130 AM EST. * At 1038 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from Southport to Cedar Run, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect hazardous road conditions. This includes the following highways... Route 6 from east of Wellsboro to the Bradford county line. Route 15 from Oak Lynn to north of Mansfield. State Road 14 from Trout Run to the Bradford County line. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Morris, Blossburg, Covington, Arnot, Millerton, Ralston, Ogdensburg, Trout Run, Buttonwood, Waterville, Cogan Station, Roseville and Mansfield University. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.
